services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.shortDescription: Scalable, high-performance web applications using modern stacks
services.fullContent:
# Full-Stack Development Services

We build complete web applications from frontend to backend, database to deployment.

## Services Include
- React & Next.js development
- Node.js & Express APIs
- PostgreSQL & database design
- Real-time features with WebSockets
- API development and integration
- Authentication & authorization

## Why Choose Us
- 5+ years of experience
- Scalable architecture
- Best practices & clean code
- Production-ready solutions

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.shortDescription: Beautiful interfaces designed for conversion and user satisfaction
services.fullContent:
# UI/UX Design Services

We create intuitive and beautiful user experiences that drive business results.

## Our Process
- User research & analysis
- Wireframing & prototyping
- Design systems creation
- Usability testing
- Design-to-development handoff

## Deliverables
- High-fidelity mockups
- Interactive prototypes
- Design specifications
- Accessibility compliance (WCAG)

## Tools We Use
- Figma for design
- Adobe XD
- Prototyping tools
- User testing platforms

services.title: Product Engineering
services.shortDescription: From idea to market-ready MVP with strategic planning
services.fullContent:
# Product Engineering Services

We help you build products from concept to launch.

## Our Approach
- MVP strategy & validation
- Agile development methodology
- Quality assurance & testing
- Go-to-market support
- Growth analytics setup

## We Handle
- Product roadmap creation
- Feature prioritization
- Technical architecture
- Team coordination
- Crisis management

## Success Metrics
- Time to market
- User acquisition
- Retention rates
- Revenue impact

services.title: Frontend Development
services.shortDescription: Modern, responsive frontends with React and Next.js
services.fullContent:
# Frontend Development Services

We create fast, responsive, and accessible frontend applications.

## Technologies
- React.js & React Hooks
- Next.js for SSR/SSG
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- State management (Redux, Zustand)

## Focus Areas
- Performance optimization
- SEO best practices
- Mobile responsiveness
- Accessibility (WCAG)
- Cross-browser compatibility

## Quality Standards
- Lighthouse scores > 90
- Zero console errors
- Semantic HTML
- CSS-in-JS solutions

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.fullContent:
# Mobile App Development

Build apps that users love on iOS and Android.

## Cross-Platform
- React Native development
- Expo for rapid development
- Code sharing between platforms

## Native Development
- Swift for iOS
- Kotlin for Android
- Native performance

## Services Include
- App strategy & design
- Development & testing
- App store deployment
- Version management
- Post-launch support

## Focus Areas
- User experience
- Performance optimization
- Offline functionality
- Push notifications
- Analytics integration

services.title: Backend & API Development
services.shortDescription: Scalable backends and APIs for modern applications
services.fullContent:
# Backend & API Development

We build robust, scalable backend systems and APIs.

## Technologies
- Node.js & Express
- Python & Django
- Database design (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- Redis for caching
- Message queues (RabbitMQ, Redis)

## Services
- RESTful API design
- GraphQL implementation
- Authentication systems
- Payment processing
- File management
- Email services

## Security
- Encryption & hashing
- Rate limiting
- SQL injection prevention
- CORS management
- API documentation

services.title: Cloud Infrastructure
services.shortDescription: Deployment, DevOps, and cloud infrastructure management
services.fullContent:
# Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps

We handle your deployment and infrastructure needs.

## Cloud Platforms
- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS)
- Google Cloud Platform
- Azure
- Render, Vercel, Netlify

## DevOps Services
- CI/CD pipeline setup
- Docker containerization
- Kubernetes orchestration
- Infrastructure as Code
- Monitoring & logging

## Security & Performance
- SSL/TLS certificates
- CDN integration
- Load balancing
- Auto-scaling
- Backup & disaster recovery

## Database Management
- PostgreSQL optimization
- Database backups
- Replication setup
- Query optimization
